item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
The Guilford Mooring Restaurant

In keeping with our summer happy hours on the shore, this weeks location is another great seafood restaurant located right on the water in Guilford.

Specials for the NHC include:
All Beers (bottles or drafts) - $3.00
Wine - $4.00
Mixed Drinks - $5.00

All Appetizers - 1/2 price

Special thanks to fellow NHC member Veronica for setting up this weeks happy hour for the group.

Contact info: Veronica (her number is in the RSVP)

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Guilford Mooring
